summary:
This mod allows you to disenchant most all of the unique weapons/armor in the game such as: Ebony Mail, Mehrunes Razor, Mace of Molag Bal, The Gauldur Amulet, and so on... Updated for DLC.
Optional file removes restrictions on enchanting.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][b][color=red][b]NO LONGER UPDATED.
[/b]PLEASE FEEL FREE TO USE THE ASSETS AS NEEDED.[/color][/b]

What this mod does:[/b][/u]
Changed some of the artifacts and unique weapons in Skyrim so that you can now disenchant them, and learn their effects, allowing you to place artifact enchantments on normal weapons. All armor/clothing enchantments can go on any item of clothing/armor.
Imagine disenchanting the Mace of Molag Bal, then placing the Molag Bal's enchantment on a Steel Sword! [url=http://i.imgur.com/0PlGn.jpg]or a Fork![/url]
Requires latest Skyrim update.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=red][u][b]Please read BEFORE asking a question[/b][/u][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/readmes/EzEs%20-Artifact%20Disenchanting-_readme.txt]Readme[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/1102/]Frequently Asked Questions[/url]

[u]Please use the topic under the forums tab to solve any issues you may have and for any bugs you spot[/u]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/8157-1-1362772973.png[/img]

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/VK6WmRE.png[/img]

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/MLCPwsY.png[/img]

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/YyASgbK.png[/img]

===================================================================================================
In the pictures I am using 4 enchantments, That is from [url=file.php?id=990]Enchanting effect mods and Perk modfications[/url] by Kivespussi
===================================================================================================

[u][b]Update Notes:[/b][/u]

[b]Version 5.3[/b]
- Skyrim 1.9 update
- Description update on a few items
- New installer now contains all files, including DLC versions

[b]Version 5.2[/b]
- Update for Dragonborn and Dawnguard
- Added Locket of St. Jiub
- Fixed missing UI info for Ahzidal's Armor of Retribution
- Keep in mind that the "Skyrim" version is still the latest - It hasn't needed updating.

[b]Version 5.1[/b]
- Dragonborn update only -
- Added Miraak's Robes
- Added Miraak's Boots/Gloves
- Added Ahzidalâ€™s Armor of Retribution

[b]Version 5.0[/b]
- Updated Ebony Mail enchantment (effect now toggles with combat - FINALLY)
- Added Spellbreaker (no more "constant ward" issue)
- Cleaned up several enchantments - includes Dawnguard [size=1](fixing descriptions - effect appearance - small bugs)[/size]
- Some re-balancing for enchantments
- Added Dragonborn (new enchantments on the way)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod was done with SkyEdit, The Creation Kit, and TESV-Edit
This is the same mod by EzE if you downloaded it on Steam. (I'm the same guy)
The version here and the version on Steam contain the exact same file if anyone was wondering.
author: xEightballx
